properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters from Stake Island LA to Southwest Pass of the Mississippi River from 20 to 60 nm; Coastal waters from Pascagoula Mississippi to Stake Island Louisiana out 20 to 60 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 31 at 3:49AM CST until January 31 at 3:00PM CST by NWS New Orleans LA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northeast winds 20 to 25 kt expected. Seas 4 to 6 feet.

* WHERE...Coastal Waters from Stake Island LA to Southwest Pass
of the Mississippi River from 20 to 60 nm and Coastal waters
from Pascagoula Mississippi to Stake Island Louisiana out 20
to 60 NM.

* WHEN...Until 3 PM CST this afternoon.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A Small Craft Advisory means that wind
speeds of 20 to 33 knots are expected to produce hazardous
wave conditions to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON
